types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# {{lb|fr|medicine}} a type of [[bandage]] that consists of fabric impregnated with soft [[paraffin oil]] (98 parts), [[balsam of Peru]] (1 part), and [[olive oil]] (1 part), which prevents its [[stick]]ing to [[wound]]s
types.html:
tulle gras m (plural tulles gras)

  1. (medicine) a type of bandage that consists of fabric impregnated with soft paraffin oil (98 parts), balsam of Peru (1 part), and olive oil (1 part), which prevents its sticking to wounds
trans: a type of bandage that consists of fabric impregnated with soft paraffin oil , balsam of Peru , and olive oil , which prevents its sticking to wounds

title: tulle gras
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /tyl ɡʁa/ ~ /tyl ɡʁɑ/
